scene_description_enriched: Two winged figures, possibly putti or angels, kneel on a stone surface. They are holding a large scroll or banner that encircles a central shield or coat of arms. The figures have wings and appear to be cherubic. The scroll is inscribed with text, and the shield displays a heraldic design. The overall scene is decorative and appears to be a symbolic representation, possibly a dedication or a family crest.
